title: Iran’s morality police return in new campaign to impose Islamic dress on women
description: Authorities in Iran announced a new campaign to force women to wear the Islamic headscarf and morality police returned to the streets 10 months after the death of Mahsa Amini.

title: How a plan to recognize Australia's indigenous people became the country's latest culture war
description: A proposal in Australia to recognize the country’s Indigenous people in the constitution has created division, including among Indigenous people themselves.

title: Russia will use cluster bombs in Ukraine if it has to, Putin says
description: President Vladimir Putin said Russia had a “sufficient stockpile” of cluster bombs and reserved the right to use them if such munitions, the use of which he said he regarded as a crime, were deployed against Russian forces in Ukraine.

title: Netanyahu fitted with heart monitor and discharged from hospital after dizzy spell
description: Israel’s Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu was discharged from hospital in “excellent condition” after an overnight stay for dehydration, the director of the cardiology unit where he was treated said Sunday.
